name: Particle Fever No.1
description: In the context of advances in artificial intelligence, machine learning and genetic engineering, there is a belief that language/information can be recycled between substrates or carriers of different materials. We are digitizing information about everything by taking advantage of its non-attachment and transferability to concrete materials. The earth is being digitized. People have put forward the concept of "digital Earth" and are actually building a digital earth.
